page.title: 13A COCKFIELD FAMILY'S WEEKEND
page.content: My name is Lisa Nickson and I live in Windsor Green,Cockfield.On Saturday morning I went to the Riding Stables fora riding lesson.Mum,Dad and Matthew my brother came too.I took my own pony, Shadow.It was a good lesson with lots ofjumping.In the afternoon we all went to Thursford in the car. The first thing that I did was to play on the playthings.Matthew called a rope that gave you a swing, a Tarzan rope because we enjoyed it.Then we went to listen to an organist.The music was very nice and had lots of tunes.On Sunday morning my dad started to build an extension to our house.It was fun because we all had to help him by moving some blocks and bricks and we saw lots of spiders,one with an egg sack.In the afternoon we went strawberry picking at my friend Kate's.We got some lovely big straw- berries and some little ones too.
